description: Developed and trained deep learning models for image classification, achieving 95% accuracy.
Collaborated with the R&D team to implement a new object detection pipeline using YOLOv8.
Preprocessed and augmented a large-scale dataset of over 50,000 images.
Assisted in developing a customer-facing web application using React and Node.js.
Wrote unit tests, improving code coverage by 15%.
Participated in agile sprints, daily stand-ups, and code reviews.
Organized and led technical workshops on Python, Git, and AI development.
Managed a team of 10+ volunteers to host AISP 2024, a university-wide IEEE conference.
Promoted student research and increased technical event participation by 30%.

role: Hackathon Finalist - MSME Smart India Hackathon
description: Led a team to design 'SmartTrackX', a vehicle tracking system for SMEs using computer vision and GPS.
Integrated YOLOv8 for real-time vehicle detection and built a lightweight web dashboard for live updates.
Presented the solution to industry and government stakeholders during the final round.
Developed a semantic-aware image compression framework combining JPEG with embedded YOLOv8 metadata.
Improved detection mAP on compressed images by 11% while retaining visual fidelity.
Co-authored a research paper under review for Springer LNNS.
Completed tasks simulating real client problems like telemetry data reconciliation and system dashboard design.
Drafted a secure, real-time intranet dashboard proposal with internal authentication and status reporting.
Gained experience in corporate reporting, Python data handling, and team collaboration workflows.
